电脑发出蜂鸣声https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/ BleepingComputer - 所有故事Sat, 06 Jul 2024 13:09:58 EDT https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/ zh
Cloudflare 将最近的中断归咎于 BGP 劫持事件https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/cloudflare-blames-recent-outage-on-bgp-hijacking-incident/ Fri, 05 Jul 2024 14:41:24 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/cloudflare-blames-recent-outage-on-bgp-hijacking-incident/ Internet giant Cloudflare reports that its DNS resolver service, 1.1.1.1, was recently unreachable or degraded for some of its customers because of a combination of Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) hijacking and a route leak. [...]
黑客泄露泰勒·斯威夫特 (Taylor Swift) 门票，加大了 Ticketmaster 勒索力度https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-leak-alleged-taylor-swift-tickets-amp-up-ticketmaster-extortion/ Fri, 05 Jul 2024 13:05:30 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-leak-alleged-taylor-swift-tickets-amp-up-ticketmaster-extortion/ Hackers have leaked what they claim is Ticketmaster barcode data for 166,000 Taylor Swift Eras Tour tickets, warning that more events would be leaked if a $2 million extortion demand is not paid. [...]
新的 Eldorado 勒索软件针对 Windows、VMware ESXi 虚拟机https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-eldorado-ransomware-targets-windows-vmware-esxi-vms/ Fri, 05 Jul 2024 11:56:01 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-eldorado-ransomware-targets-windows-vmware-esxi-vms/ A new ransomware-as-a-service (RaaS) called Eldorado emerged in March and comes with locker variants for VMware ESXi and Windows. 以太坊邮件列表泄露导致 35,000 人遭受加密货币耗尽攻击https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/ethereum-mailing-list-breach-exposes-35-000-to-crypto-draining-attack/ Thu, 04 Jul 2024 12:17:29 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityCryptoCurrency https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/ethereum-mailing-list-breach-exposes-35-000-to-crypto-draining-attack/ A threat actor compromised Ethereum's mailing list provider and sent to over 35,000 addresses a phishing email with a link to a malicious site running a crypto drainer. 黑客攻击 HFS 服务器以投放恶意软件和门罗币矿工https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-attack-hfs-servers-to-drop-malware-and-monero-miners/ Thu, 04 Jul 2024 08:33:10 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-attack-hfs-servers-to-drop-malware-and-monero-miners/ Hackers are targeting older versions of the HTTP File Server (HFS) from Rejetto to drop malware and cryptocurrency mining software. [...]
HealthEquity 数据泄露暴露了受保护的健康信息https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/healthequity-data-breach-exposes-protected-health-information/ Wed, 03 Jul 2024 15:34:40 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityHealthcare https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/healthequity-data-breach-exposes-protected-health-information/ Healthcare fintech firm HealthEquity is warning that it suffered a data breach after a partner's account was compromised and used to access the Company's systems to steal protected health information. OVHcloud 将破纪录的 DDoS 攻击归咎于 MikroTik 僵尸网络https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/ovhcloud-blames-record-writing-ddos-attack-on-mikrotik-botnet/ Wed, 03 Jul 2024 14:07:29 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/ovhcloud-blames-record-writing-ddos-attack-on-mikrotik-botnet/ OVHcloud, a global cloud services provider and one of the largest of its kind in Europe, says it mitigated a record-breaking distributed denial of service (DDoS) attack earlier this year that reached an unprecedented packet rate of 840 million packets per second (Mpps). [...]
黑客滥用 API 验证数百万个 Authy MFA 电话号码https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-abused-api-to-verify-millions-of-authy-mfa-phone-numbers/ Wed, 03 Jul 2024 12:43:12 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/hackers-abused-api-to-verify-millions-of-authy-mfa-phone-numbers/ Twilio has confirmed that an unsecured API endpoint allowed threat actors to verify the phone numbers of millions of Authy multi-factor authentication users, potentially making them vulnerable to SMS phishing and SIM swapping attacks. [...]
一级方程式管理机构披露电子邮件遭黑客攻击后数据泄露https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/formula-1-governing-body-discloses-data-breach-after-email-hacks/ Wed, 03 Jul 2024 11:53:41 -0400塞尔吉·加特兰Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/formula-1-governing-body-discloses-data-breach-after-email-hacks/ FIA (Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile), the auto racing governing body since the 1950s, says attackers gained access to personal data after compromising several FIA email accounts in a phishing attack. [...]
用于识别虐待儿童网站成员的 Infostealer 恶意软件日志https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/infostealer-malware-logs-used-to-identify-child-abuse-website-members/ Wed, 03 Jul 2024 11:52:36 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityLegal https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/infostealer-malware-logs-used-to-identify-child-abuse-website-members/ Thousands of pedophiles who download and share child sexual abuse material (CSAM) were identified through information-stealing malware logs leaked on the dark web, highlighting a new dimension of using stolen credentials in law enforcement investigations. [...]
欧洲刑警组织捣毁了网络犯罪分子使用的 593 台 Cobalt Strike 服务器https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/europol-takes-down-593-cobalt-strike-servers-used-by-cybercriminals/ Wed, 03 Jul 2024 10:46:32 -0400塞尔吉·加特兰Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/europol-takes-down-593-cobalt-strike-servers-used-by-cybercriminals/ Europol coordinated a joint law enforcement action known as Operation Morpheus, which led to the takedown of almost 600 Cobalt Strike servers used by cybercriminals to infiltrate victims' networks.
